Henlo! My name is Fajar Nugroho, thanks for visiting my site. I currently work as a Marketing Analyst at Rakamin Academy a Start Up Education Technology based in Jakarta, Indonesia. I enjoy using R adn Python since join Bootcamp Data Science at Algoritma Data Science School. <br>
Previously, I completed my Bachelor of Fisheries Science at [Universitas Gadjah Mada](https://www.ugm.ac.id/) in August 2018. I enjoy writing about things I'm working on and try to share some interesting things I discover on my blog.

Feel free to get in touch if any of the posts catch your interest!
